'''1.21.11 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.11-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], released on December 4, 2025,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-21-11-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.11 Release Candidate 1|December 4, 2025}}</ref> which tweaks spear mechanics.

A separate [[unobfuscated version]] of 1.21.11 Release Candidate 1 was released, titled '''1.21.11 Release Candidate 1 Unobfuscated''' (or '''1.21.11-rc1_unobfuscated''' when in the launcher). This is an experimental version released in preparation for obfuscation being removed from {{JE}} clients and servers.<ref>{{Mcnet|removing-obfuscation-in-java-edition|Removing obfuscation in Java Edition|October 29, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
{{Animate|Wooden Spear.png;Stone Spear.png;Copper Spear.png;Iron Spear.png;Golden Spear.png;Diamond Spear.png;Netherite Spear.png|32px|class=pixel-image}} '''[[Spear]]'''
* Increased the maximum duration during which the spear can deal knockback while charging.
** For [[wooden spear]]s, changed from {{cd|120}} to {{cd|200}} ticks.
** For [[stone spear]]s, changed from {{cd|110}} to {{cd|180}} ticks.
** For [[copper spear]]s, changed from {{cd|100}} to {{cd|165}} ticks.
** For [[iron spear]]s, changed from {{cd|90}} to {{cd|135}} ticks.
** For [[golden spear]]s, changed from {{cd|110}} to {{cd|170}} ticks.
** For [[diamond spear]]s, changed from {{cd|80}} to {{cd|130}} ticks.
** For [[netherite spear]]s, changed from {{cd|70}} to {{cd|110}} ticks.
** The charge attack animations now better correspond to the different phases of the spear.</onlyinclude>
